unnormalised: Bore, konnem tor vicharle, "Linear Algebra khorench upyogi asa?" Bhai, hanv tuka sangtam, tumi azun logn kiteak zaunk na mhunn tumchea soireank sangpak prayatn korche poros tem odik upyogi asa! Tumi chemistryant equations balance korop kathin aslem mhunn chintat? Linear Algebra nastana 100 unknowns aslolea 100 equations-anchi system solve korpak prayatn korun dekh! Tumi "Eigenvalue" mhonnchem porian tumi tumchea chai-nt dukam dhartole! Vastavik tor, aunty-n dusrea velar vicharlem zalear, fokot mhonn, "Auntyji, hanv sodeak 100-dimensional vector space-nt complex eigenvalue problem solve korpant guntlolean!" Tika bhagun vochtai polleiat!
normalised: Borem, konnen tori vicharlem, "Linear Algebra khorench upyogi asa?" Bhava, hanv tuka sangtam, tem tunv ailech kiteak lagin lagin zaunk na mhunn tujea soireank sangpa porosui odik upyogi asa! Tunv chemistry-nt equations balance korop kastaklem mhunn chintai? Linear Algebra nastana ekxim unknowns astana ekxim equations-anchi system solve korunk voir! "Eigenvalue" mhonn sangonk lagtelea poros tunv chaitulea bhitor rodtai! Khorench, aunty-n punn vicharlem zalear, fokot mhonn, "Auntyji, hanv sodankal ekxim dimensional vector space-ant ek complex eigenvalue problem solve korunk vyast asan!" Tika poloi dhauvotai!

unnormalised: Gambhirponnan chintlear, awkward family encounters-ank talche bhair, Linear Algebra digital dunyecho secret sauce jevonnant ghalche sarke asa. Image compression-achea vixayant chintat – tumi zannant, tumchea phone-nt fit zatat te HUGE vacation photos? Tem Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) aplem magic kortat! Uprant machine learning asa. Netflix tumi khoreponnan pollovpak zai asat te shows koxe suggest korta mhunn tumi kednaim vicharlem? Tem Linear Algebra baby! Recommendation systems thaun facial recognition porian, tachem 90% matrices, vectors, ani transformations bhaxen concepts vaparta.
normalised: Gambhirponnani zai tori, addvank family encounters-anchea bhair, Linear Algebra digital jagache secret sauce porox asa. Image compression-ak chint – tumkam mahit asa, tim vhodd vacation photu tujea phone-ar fit korop? Tem Singular Value Decomposition (S-V-D) apli magic kortanv! Uprant machine learning asa. Netflix koxem tumi sodankal poleuncheo shows tumkam suggest kortanv mhunn kadi zalam? Tem sogllench Linear Algebra baby! Recommendation systems thoim thaun facial recognition porian, tem soglleantle ninety percent matrices, vectors ani transformations koxem concepts vaprun kortanv.

unnormalised: Mhunn, Linear Algebra upyogi asa? Tumchea coding assignment-ant bhitor sortolea tumchea chai-ntlean sugar-acho extra spoon ghetle poros odik upyogi! Tumi PCA (Principal Component Analysis)-acho tumcho bodh tumchea boss-acher impress korpak prayatn kortat vo fokot lognacho ul'las talpak prayatn kortat, fundamentals somzolear tumkam vastavik-dunyechea problems-antlean vachovnk xakta. Tumchea fuddlechea family gathering-antlean tumchea matrix multiplication-ak brush up korpak yaad dovrat. Tumkam chetaunni dil'lea!
normalised: Zao, Linear Algebra upyogi asa? Tujea coding assignment-ache bhitor thoim thaun vochonek tujea chaintulantlea sakrechea ekadlea spoon porosui odik upyogi! Tunv tujea boss-ak tujem P-C-A (Principal Component Analysis) samzunk impress korunk prayatn kortai vo fokot wedding talk thoim thaun avoid korunk prayatn kortai zalear, fundamentals samzunk tuka real-world problems thoim thaun vataunk xokta. Fokot tuzem matrix multiplication next family gathering-ache poilim refresh korunk mhunn yaad dovrunk. Tuka suchovnni dilea!
